ygData.subject: cancelling my subscription

-----Original Message-----
From: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, July 04, 1999 6:26 AM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Digest Number 83


>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------

>There are 3 messages in this issue.
>
>Topics in today's digest:
>
> 1. Strength Bonus
> From: Paul Jesernig <PWJ@...>
> 2. the idel warriors 1H slashing weapon
> From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
> 3. Re: the idel warriors 1H slashing weapon

>Message: 1
> Date: Sat, 3 Jul 1999 15:04:18 -0400
> From: Paul Jesernig <PWJ@...>
>Subject: Strength Bonus
>
>You'll see a little more damage at 20. Once you hit 25, the str bonus
>pretty much kicks in full. Not sure about between 20 and 25, but I know
>once you hit 25 any str buffs add directly to your attack rating.
>
>
>Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~
>
>Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
>>Simple question: is it true and how does it work?
>
>I'm at level 17 right now and I'm getting tired of only dishing out 12 max
>damage with my combines. Even when I go into berserker rage the damage
>doesn't change. Is there really a magic level (20) where suddenly strength
>does matter? I'd hate to think I'm buying all this magic armor for
>nothing.
><
>
>
>
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>___________________________________________________________________________
____
>
>Message: 2
> Date: Sat, 03 Jul 1999 19:27:53 GMT
> From: Dean Boyle <gino_14@...>
>Subject: the idel warriors 1H slashing weapon
>

>only" 1H slashing Long Sword.a.k.a... "The PainBringer" !!
>

>
